personal.shortBio: Mr. IIoT specializes in providing advanced IoT solutions that drive digital Industry 4.0 transformation and industrial automation, empowering businesses to leverage the Internet of Things to increase operational efficiency, enhance business intelligence, and foster process optimization.
personal.fullBio:
At Mr. IIoT, we specialize in providing advanced IoT solutions that drive digital Industry 4.0 transformation and industrial automation. Our mission is to empower businesses to leverage the Internet of Things (IoT) to increase operational efficiency, enhance business intelligence, and foster process optimization.

The Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) means accessing real-time information from manufacturing assets and refers to a network of interconnected devices that communicate and exchange data with each other over the internet. By integrating sensors, software, and other technologies, IoT enables devices to collect and share data seamlessly, leading to smarter operations and better decision-making across various industries.

Mr. IIoT offers comprehensive and customized business system integration services and products designed to facilitate your organization's transition to a digital future. Our expert team works directly with you and implements tailored strategies, so you get more than just production out of your machinery. We provide business system integration solutions that ensure your existing systems and new IoT technologies work harmoniously together, enhancing information flow and operational synergy.

We recognize that every organization is unique. Our solutions are customized to meet your specific needs, ensuring a smoother transition and effective system integration. We are dedicated to providing you with digital industry transformation solutions that position your business for sustained success.

services.title: Machine Data Integration
services.shortDesc: Unified data integration platform with real-time visibility, low-code configuration, and an extensive connector library.
services.fullDesc: Our integration platform provides next-generation industrial DataOps capabilities. With support for dozens of source and sink protocols including MTConnect, OPC-UA, MQTT, Modbus/TCP, Siemens S7, Fanuc CNC, and many more, we connect your disparate systems into a unified data pipeline. Low-code/no-code configuration reduces implementation time and cost.

services.title: Machine Data Analytics
services.shortDesc: Scalable machine data collection and analytics built on the 5C Transformation framework: Collect, Convert, Convey, Contextualize, and Contribute.
services.fullDesc: Our comprehensive analytics solutions follow the 5C Transformation framework to turn raw machine data into business value. We emphasize data ownership — ensuring you maintain full control with no vendor lock-in. We focus on proper data interpretation rather than stretching raw data into downstream applications, and we champion machine data standardization using established industry protocols like MTConnect rather than inventing proprietary formats. Our scalable platform provides real-time visibility across your entire operation with custom Grafana dashboards, OEE tracking, and predictive analytics.

solutions.title: IT/OT Connectivity
solutions.description: Bridge the gap between Information Technology and Operational Technology systems. solutions.description: Comprehensive Industry 4.0 transformation services tailored to your unique manufacturing environment. We partnered with a global leader in industrial fluid systems to deliver customized solutions addressing specific technical challenges, working across departments to improve processes and guide their digital transformation journey.

solutions.description: Real-time visibility into machine performance, status, and health. We deployed the SHARC IoT sensor adapter at Ox Box to track machine performance and operational efficiency, enabling data-driven decisions that greatly improved their production process.

solutions.description: Streamline and automate order processing workflows. We transformed Tempco's order processing by implementing EDI integration through SPS Commerce for their Grainger partnership, fully automating order entry so orders flow 24/7 without manual intervention.

process.title: Assess
process.fullDesc: We start by understanding what's actually happening on your factory floor. We evaluate your existing machinery, network infrastructure, data flows, and organizational readiness. This assessment identifies the gaps between where you are and where you need to be for successful digital transformation.

process.title: Design
process.fullDesc: With a clear understanding of your environment and goals, we design a tailored solution architecture. This includes sensor selection, network topology, data integration strategy, and analytics platform configuration — all customized to your specific manufacturing environment and business objectives.

process.title: Implement
process.fullDesc: Our team works directly with your IT/OT personnel to install and configure all hardware and software components. We ensure every SHARC adapter, integration connector, and analytics dashboard is properly deployed, tested, and validated before going live.

process.title: Optimize
process.fullDesc: Once your system is live, we help you leverage the data to drive real operational improvements. We provide training, ongoing support, and optimization guidance to ensure your team can harness the full potential of your new digital infrastructure for sustained success.

problems.solution: Legacy machines running blind with no data collection. The SHARC IoT sensor adapter connects any sensor to any network, giving you real-time visibility into machine status, performance, and health without replacing existing equipment.

Different machines speaking different protocols with no unified view. Our integration platform supports 25+ source protocols and 15+ sink protocols, creating a unified data pipeline from any equipment to any enterprise system.

Unexpected machine failures disrupting production schedules and costing thousands per hour. Predictive analytics based on real-time sensor data help you predict and prevent shutdowns before they happen.

Operators recording machine data on clipboards and spreadsheets — slow, error-prone, and impossible to analyze at scale. Automated data collection eliminates manual effort and provides accurate, real-time information.

Factory floor systems isolated from enterprise IT, creating blind spots in business intelligence. We bridge the IT/OT gap with secure, reliable connectivity between operational technology and information systems.
Managers making production decisions without data to back them up. Real-time dashboards and analytics provide fact-based insights so every decision is informed by actual machine and process data.
Older machines with no built-in connectivity being left behind in digital transformation. The SHARC adapter retrofits any machine with IoT capability — no equipment replacement needed.
Struggling to meet regulatory requirements with manual record-keeping. Automated data logging and audit trails ensure full traceability and compliance without additional operator burden.
Stuck with proprietary platforms that only work with specific equipment brands. Our universal, standards-based approach works with any sensor, any protocol, and any platform — no vendor lock-in.
